Pusher | London | Platform Engineering Manager | Perm Our new product infrastructure takes the best lessons we've learned scaling realtime applications. Our platform allows us to quickly add new products like Chatkit, Feeds, and TextSync into our portfolio.

We're looking for someone to continue to expand this vision and lead the team at the heart of our new product efforts. We want you to help the core platform meet the strategic goals of both the products it supports and the wider company.
